name: Revenge of the Pink Panther
summary_text: To prove that he still is strong and powerful, Philippe Douvier decides to kill Clouseau. Once news of his "death" has been announced, Clouseau tries to take advantage of it and goes undercover with Cato to find out who tried to kill him.

name: Detective Byomkesh Bakshy!
summary_text: While investigating the disappearance of a chemist, a detective uncovers a larger conspiracy to unsettle Calcutta.

name: Casa de mi Padre
summary_text: Scheming on a way to save their father's ranch, the Alvarez brothers find themselves in a war with Mexico's most feared drug lord.

name: Nightbreed
summary_text: A troubled young man is drawn to a mythical place called Midian where a variety of friendly monsters are hiding from humanity. Meanwhile, a sadistic serial killer is looking for a patsy.

name: Dead Presidents
summary_text: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

name: Cadillac Records
summary_text: Chronicles the rise of Chess Records and its recording artists.

name: Lonely Hearts
summary_text: Based on the true story, two homicide detectives track Martha Beck and Raymond Martinez Fernandez, a murderous pair known as the "Lonely Hearts Killers" who lured their victims through the personals.

name: Sand Castle
summary_text: The story follows a young soldier, and his introduction into the 2003 invasion of Iraq. Based on true events, it bears witness to the destruction, and horrors of war.

name: Pieces of April
summary_text: A wayward daughter invites her dying mother and the rest of her estranged family to her apartment for Thanksgiving dinner.

name: Barely Lethal
summary_text: A teenage special ops agent coveting a "normal" adolescence fakes her own death and enrolls in a suburban high school. She quickly learns that surviving the treacherous waters of high school is more challenging than international espionage.

name: Early Man
summary_text: Set at the dawn of time, when prehistoric creatures and woolly mammoths roamed the earth, Early Man tells the story of Dug, along with sidekick Hognob as they unite his tribe against a mighty enemy Lord Nooth and his Bronze Age City to save their home.

name: Leap!
summary_text: An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house.

name: The History Boys
summary_text: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

name: Easy Virtue
summary_text: A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.

name: Juliet, Naked
summary_text: Juliet, Naked is the story of Annie (the long-suffering girlfriend of Duncan) and her unlikely transatlantic romance with once revered, now faded, singer-songwriter, Tucker Crowe, who also happens to be the subject of Duncan's musical obsession.

name: Lucky
summary_text: Lucky follows the spiritual journey of a 90-year-old atheist and the quirky characters that inhabit his off the map desert town.

name: A Dog's Journey
summary_text: A dog finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he meets.

name: Super Dark Times
summary_text: Teenagers Zach and Josh have been best friends their whole lives, but when a gruesome accident leads to a cover-up, the secret drives a wedge between them and propels them down a rabbit hole of escalating paranoia and violence.

name: They Call Me Trinity
summary_text: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

name: Bad Samaritan
summary_text: A pair of burglars stumble upon a woman being held captive in a home they intended to rob.

name: Assault on Wall Street
summary_text: Jim, an average New Yorker, lives with a sick but loving wife. Suddenly, everything changes when the economy crashes and causes him to lose everything. Filled with anger and rage, Jim goes to seek revenge for the life taken from him.

name: Ocean's 11
summary_text: Danny Ocean gathers a group of his World War II compatriots to pull off the ultimate Las Vegas heist. Together the eleven friends plan to rob five Las Vegas casinos in one night.

name: Them!
summary_text: The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.

name: The Birth of a Nation
summary_text: Nat Turner, a literate slave and preacher in the antebellum South, orchestrates an uprising.

name: Fail Safe
summary_text: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

name: Enigma
summary_text: A young genius frantically races against time to crack an enemy code and solve the mystery surrounding the woman he loves.

name: High Anxiety
summary_text: A psychiatrist with intense acrophobia (fear of heights) goes to work for a mental institution run by doctors who appear to be crazier than their patients, and have secrets that they are willing to commit murder to keep.

name: The Opposite of Sex
summary_text: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

name: Ondine
summary_text: An Irish fisherman discovers a woman in his fishing net whom his precocious daughter believes to be a selkie.

name: The Borrowers
summary_text: A secret family of four-inch people living inside the walls of a house must save their home from an evil real estate developer.

name: Pickpocket
summary_text: Michel passes the time by picking pockets, careful to never be caught despite being watched by the police. His friend Jacques may suspect, while both men may have their eyes on Jeanne, the pretty neighbor of Michel's ailing mother.

name: Leatherface
summary_text: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

name: We Are What We Are
summary_text: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

name: Marked for Death
summary_text: A retired DEA agent is out to hunt down and take out a Jamaican drug posse that has targeted he and his family for murder.

name: The Express
summary_text: A drama based on the life of college football hero Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy.

name: Hidden
summary_text: A family takes refuge in a bomb shelter to avoid a dangerous outbreak.

name: What's Up, Doc?
summary_text: The accidental mix-up of four identical plaid overnight bags leads to a series of increasingly wild and wacky situations.

name: Random Hearts
summary_text: Police Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broek (Harrison Ford) and U.S. Representative Kay Chandler (Dame Kristin Scott Thomas) lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.

name: Resurrecting the Champ
summary_text: Up-and-coming sports reporter rescues a homeless man ("Champ") only to discover that he is, in fact, a boxing legend believed to have passed away. What begins as an opportunity to resurrect Champ's story and escape the shadow of his father's success becomes a personal journey as the ambitious reporter reexamines his own life and his relationship with his family.

name: The Duellists
summary_text: France, 1801. Due to a minor, perceived slight mild-mannered Lieutenant d'Hubert is forced into a duel with the hot-headed, irrational Lieutenant Feraud. The disagreement ultimately results in scores of duels, spanning several years.

name: The Yards
summary_text: Leo is released from prison after serving time for car theft. His plan to go straight falls apart when he meets his corrupt uncle for a job and later an old friend working there. It culminates at the (railroad) yards.

name: Lost and Delirious
summary_text: After starting at an upmarket boarding school, a teenage girl forms close friendships with her two older roommates. However, when she discovers that her new friends are lovers she finds herself caught in a complicated situation.

name: Explorers
summary_text: A boy obsessed with '50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

name: Cemetery Man
summary_text: A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.

name: Intruders
summary_text: Two children living in different countries are visited nightly by a faceless being who wants to take possession of them.

name: Fermat's Room
summary_text: 4 mathematicians are invited to solve an enigma. Once there, they're locked in a mechanically shrinking room and given 1 minute to solve each puzzle via cellphone while also figuring out why they're there.

name: Flickering Lights
summary_text: A gang of 4 Danish criminals are ordered by Færingen to steal a bag from a safe. When they see DKK4,000,000 in the bag, they keep it for themselves and head for Spain. They end up in a ruin of an old restaurant on Funen and renovate it.

name: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
summary_text: Nishant starts dating Charu while his roommates Rajat and Vikrant already have girlfriends in Neha and Rhea respectively. Trouble starts when the guys feel that their girlfriends are dominating them.

name: Bounce
summary_text: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

name: Life After Beth
summary_text: A young man's recently deceased girlfriend mysteriously returns from the dead, but he slowly realizes she is not the way he remembered her.

name: Lucky You
summary_text: A hotshot poker player tries to win a tournament in Vegas, but is fighting a losing battle with his personal problems.

name: Tetsuo: The Iron Man
summary_text: A businessman accidentally kills The Metal Fetishist, who gets his revenge by slowly turning the man into a grotesque hybrid of flesh and rusty metal.

name: Rurouni Kenshin Part I: Origins
summary_text: A former assassin who has resolved to never kill again has his vow sorely tested.

name: Saints and Soldiers
summary_text: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.

name: The Extraordinary Adventures of Adèle Blanc-Sec
summary_text: An adventure set in the early part of the 20th century and focused on a popular novelist and her dealings with would-be suitors, the cops, monsters, and other distractions.

name: Slacker
summary_text: A day in the life of Austin, Texas as the camera roams from place to place and provides a brief look at the overeducated, the social misfits, the outcasts and the oddballs.

name: Angels with Dirty Faces
summary_text: A priest tries to stop a gangster from corrupting a group of street kids.

name: War
summary_text: An Indian soldier chases after his mentor who has gone rogue following an unexpected kill.

name: Europa
summary_text: Just after W.W.II, an American takes a railway job in Germany, but finds his position politically sensitive with various people trying to use him.

name: Empire State
summary_text: Two childhood friends plan to rob an armored-car depository, but an NYPD officer stands in their way.

name: Bride & Prejudice
summary_text: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

name: Highlander: The Final Dimension
summary_text: Deceived that he had won the Prize, Connor MacLeod awakens from a peaceful life when an entombed immortal magician comes seeking the Highlander.

name: Code 46
summary_text: A futuristic Brief Encounter (1945), this is a love story in which the romance is doomed by genetic incompatibility.

name: Hairspray
summary_text: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

name: A Haunted House 2
summary_text: Having exorcised the demons of his ex, Malcolm is starting fresh with his new girlfriend and her two children. After moving into their dream home, however, Malcolm is once again plagued by bizarre paranormal events.

name: The Call
summary_text: Two people live in different times. Seo-Yeon lives in the present and Young-Sook lives in the past. One phone call connects the two, and their lives are changed irrevocably.

name: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
summary_text: A simple small-town man inherits a massive fortune and is immediately hounded by those who wish to take advantage of him.

name: Fletch Lives
summary_text: After receiving an inheritance in Louisiana, Los Angeles reporter Irvin Fletcher heads to the Belle Isle plantation where he gets himself into hilarious trouble.

name: Funny Farm
summary_text: A couple swap city life for the country, but their picturesque new hometown turns out to be just a little bit different to what they were expecting.

name: A Matter of Life and Death
summary_text: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.

name: Fifty Shades of Black
summary_text: An inexperienced college student meets a wealthy businessman whose sexual practices put a strain on their relationship.

name: Hud
summary_text: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

name: Zardoz
summary_text: In the distant future, a savage trained only to kill finds a way into the community of bored immortals that alone preserves humanity's achievements.

name: Pet Sematary II
summary_text: A teenage boy and his father move to his recently-deceased mother's hometown, where they encounter the ancient Native American cemetery with the power to raise the dead.

name: Martian Child
summary_text: A science-fiction writer, recently widowed, considers whether to adopt a hyper-imaginative 6-year-old abandoned and socially rejected boy who says he's really from Mars.

name: Deadwood: The Movie
summary_text: As the residents of Deadwood gather to commemorate Dakota's statehood in 1889, saloon owner Al Swearengen and Marshal Seth Bullock clash with Senator George Hearst.

name: Cherry
summary_text: Cherry drifts from college dropout to army medic in Iraq - anchored only by his true love, Emily. But after returning from the war with PTSD, his life spirals into drugs and crime as he struggles to find his place in the world.

name: Purple Rain
summary_text: A young musician, tormented by an abusive situation at home, must contend with a rival singer, a burgeoning romance, and his own dissatisfied band, as his star begins to rise.

name: 9th Company
summary_text: Young Soviet Army recruits are stuck in the bloody war in Afghanistan, that was started by politicians.

name: The Possession of Hannah Grace
summary_text: When a cop who is just out of rehab takes the graveyard shift in a city hospital morgue, she faces a series of bizarre, violent events caused by an evil entity in one of the corpses.

name: Gigi
summary_text: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship which may not stay platonic for long.

name: Think Like a Man Too
summary_text: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

name: Into the White
summary_text: Norway, WWII: A group of British and German soldiers find themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. Finding shelter in the same cabin, they realize the only way to survive the winter is to place the rules of war aside.

name: Cleanskin
summary_text: A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

name: Terminal
summary_text: A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?

name: Are We Done Yet?
summary_text: Newlyweds Nick and Suzanne decide to move to the suburbs to provide a better life for their two kids. But their idea of a dream home is disturbed by a contractor with a bizarre approach to business.

name: Les rivières pourpres 2 - Les anges de l'apocalypse
summary_text: Pierre Niemans faces the threat of the apocalypse while investigating a series of ritual murders.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary_text: An unexpected romance blooms after the the youngest daughter of a merchant who has fallen on hard times offers herself to the mysterious beast to which her father has become indebted.

name: The Alamo
summary_text: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

name: Underdog
summary_text: A Beagle must use his newly-bestowed superpowers to defend Capitol City from mad scientist Simon Barsinister.

name: Teaching Mrs. Tingle
summary_text: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.

name: I've Loved You So Long
summary_text: A woman struggles to interact with her family and find her place in society after spending fifteen years in prison.

name: Bareilly Ki Barfi
summary_text: Set in the small-town of Bareilly, Bitti is a free-spirited young girl who lives life on her own terms and refuses to be pressured into getting married. Her life takes a shift when she meets Chirag Dubey and Pritam Vidrohi.

name: Phantoms
summary_text: In the peaceful town of Snowfield, Colorado something evil has wiped out the community. And now, its up to a group of people to stop it, or at least get out of Snowfield alive.

name: The Year of Living Dangerously
summary_text: A young Australian reporter tries to navigate the political turmoil of Indonesia during the rule of President Sukarno with the help of a diminutive photographer.

name: The Trial
summary_text: An unassuming office worker is arrested and stands trial, but he is never made aware of his charges.

name: White Fang
summary_text: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

name: Toy Soldiers
summary_text: A group of troublemaking boys decide to take a stand when terrorists seize control of their boarding school.

name: The Eagle Has Landed
summary_text: A German plot to kidnap Sir Winston Churchill unfolds at the height of World War II.

name: Big Trouble
summary_text: The lives of several Miami denizens, from ad agents to gunrunners to street thugs to law enforcement to school-children, intersect with humorous and dangerous results.

name: Six Degrees of Separation
summary_text: An affluent New York City couple finds their lives touched, intruded upon, and compelled by a mysterious young black man who is never quite who he says he is.

name: Cemetery Junction
summary_text: A 1970s-set comedy centered on three young working class friends in a dreary suburb of Reading.

name: Kidnapping Mr. Heineken
summary_text: The inside story of the planning, execution, rousing aftermath, and ultimate downfall of the kidnappers of beer tycoon Alfred "Freddy" Heineken in 1983, which resulted in the largest ransom ever paid for an individual.

name: Beyond Skyline
summary_text: A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.

name: The Tunnel
summary_text: An investigation into a government cover-up leads to a network of abandoned train tunnels deep beneath the heart of Sydney. As a journalist and her crew hunt for the story it quickly becomes clear the story is hunting them.

name: Return to Me
summary_text: A man who falls in love with the woman who received his wife's heart must decide which woman it is who holds his heart.

name: Stop-Loss
summary_text: A veteran soldier returns from his completed tour of duty in Iraq, only to find his life turned upside down when he is arbitrarily ordered to return to field duty by the Army.

name: The Muppets Take Manhattan
summary_text: Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

name: Young Sherlock Holmes
summary_text: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

name: Playtime
summary_text: Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.

name: Titus
summary_text: Titus returns victorious from war, only to plant the seeds of future turmoil for himself and his family.

name: One, Two, Three
summary_text: In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.

name: Adam's Rib
summary_text: Domestic and professional tensions mount when a husband and wife work as opposing lawyers in a case involving a woman who shot her husband.

name: Supercop
summary_text: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

name: Basquiat
summary_text: The brief life of Jean Michel Basquiat, a world renowned New York street artist struggling with fame, drugs and his identity.

name: A Hidden Life
summary_text: The Austrian Franz Jägerstätter, a conscientious objector, refuses to fight for the Nazis in World War II.

name: A Man Escaped
summary_text: A captured French Resistance fighter during WWII engineers a daunting escape from a Nazi prison in France.

name: Bad Day at Black Rock
summary_text: A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.

name: Breathe
summary_text: The inspiring true love story of Robin (Andrew Garfield) and Diana Cavendish (Claire Foy), an adventurous couple who refuse to give up in the face of a devastating disease. Their heartwarming celebration of human possibility marks the directorial debut of Andy Serkis.

name: Antebellum
summary_text: Successful author Veronica Henley finds herself trapped in a horrifying reality and must uncover the mind-bending mystery before it's too late.

name: Killing Zoe
summary_text: The cab driver sets American Zed up with Zoe in his Paris hotel. Despite FFR1000 charged, she's an art student with day jobs e.g. bank. Safecracker Zed meets his junkie friend after 11 years to rob a bank.

name: Russian Dolls
summary_text: Five years after their summer together in Barcelona, Xavier, William, Wendy, Martine and Isabelle reunite.

name: A Monster in Paris
summary_text: A 3D-animated movie set in Paris in the year 1910 and centered on a monster who lives in a garden and his love for a beautiful, young singer.

name: Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
summary_text: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romance.

name: My Summer of Love
summary_text: In the Yorkshire countryside, working-class tomboy Mona meets the exotic, pampered Tamsin. Over the summer season, the two young women discover they have much to teach one another, and much to explore together.

name: Salvador
summary_text: A burnt-out photojournalist becomes involved in a Central American revolution.

name: Victor Victoria
summary_text: A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.

name: City Hall
summary_text: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

name: My Soul to Take
summary_text: A serial killer returns to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest.

name: Like Father
summary_text: After she's left at the altar, a workaholic advertising executive ends up on her Caribbean honeymoon cruise with her estranged father.

name: I Don't Know How She Does It
summary_text: A comedy centered on the life of Kate Reddy, a finance executive who is the breadwinner for her husband and two kids.

name: The Namesake
summary_text: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

name: The Limits of Control
summary_text: The story of a mysterious loner, a stranger in the process of completing a criminal job.

name: Uzak
summary_text: After his wife leaves him, a photographer has an existential crisis and tries to cope with his cousin's visit.

name: Margot at the Wedding
summary_text: Margot and her son Claude decide to visit her sister Pauline after she announces that she is marrying less-than-impressive Malcolm. In short order, the storm the sisters create leaves behind a mess of thrashed relationships and exposed family secrets.

name: First Strike
summary_text: This fourth installment of Chan's Police Story film franchise has our hero trying to locate a missing nuclear warhead.

name: Host
summary_text: Six friends hire a medium to hold a seance via Zoom during lockdown, but they get far more than they bargained for as things quickly go wrong.

name: The Blackcoat's Daughter
summary_text: Two girls must battle a mysterious evil force when they get left behind at their boarding school over winter break.

name: Waiting for Forever
summary_text: A Hollywood-set romantic tale of a guy who is content to live his life without a job yet with the love of his life, a young actress.

name: My Sassy Girl
summary_text: A sweet Midwestern guy with his life planned out for himself is wooed, groomed, and ultimately dumped by a complicated, elusive gal.

name: The Lady Eve
summary_text: A trio of classy card sharks targets the socially awkward heir to brewery millions for his money, until one of them falls in love with him.

name: The Long Good Friday
summary_text: An up-and-coming gangster is tested by the insurgence of an unknown, very powerful threat.

name: Cruising
summary_text: A police detective goes undercover in the underground S&M gay subculture of New York City to catch a serial killer who is preying on gay men.

name: The Lover
summary_text: In 1929 French Indochina, a French teenage girl embarks on a reckless and forbidden romance with a wealthy, older Chinese man, each knowing that knowledge of their affair will bring drastic consequences to each other.

name: Nancy Drew
summary_text: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.

name: Beirut
summary_text: Caught in the crossfires of civil war, CIA operatives must send a former U.S. diplomat to negotiate for the life of a friend he left behind.

name: Vampire Killers
summary_text: Their women having been enslaved by the local pack of lesbian vampires thanks to an ancient curse, the remaining menfolk of a rural town send two hapless young lads out onto the moors as a sacrifice.

name: Hellraiser: Bloodline
summary_text: In the 22nd century, a scientist attempts to right the wrong his ancestor created: the puzzle box that opens the gates of Hell and unleashes Pinhead and his Cenobite legions.

name: The Killers
summary_text: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and investigator Reardon uncovers his past involvement with beautiful, deadly Kitty Collins.

name: Meet Bill
summary_text: A guy fed up with his job and married to a cheating wife reluctantly mentors a rebellious teen.

name: So Undercover
summary_text: A tough, street-smart private eye is hired by the FBI to go undercover in a college sorority.

name: Meatballs
summary_text: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

name: Denial
summary_text: Acclaimed writer and historian Deborah E. Lipstadt must battle for historical truth to prove the Holocaust actually occurred when David Irving, a renowned denier, sues her for libel.

name: Skiptrace
summary_text: A detective from Hong Kong teams up with an American gambler to battle against a notorious Chinese criminal.

name: Issiz Adam
summary_text: Tells about those people whose lives have been isolated by modern lifestyles; It is also Foods, mothers, old songs and love that this movie is consists of.

name: Pardon
summary_text: Based on a true event, Pardon tells the tragicomic story of three friends who end up in prison when they are mistaken as members of a terrorist organization. Ibrahim's fear of uniforms ...                See full summary »

name: Cat People
summary_text: A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.

name: Into the Forest
summary_text: After a massive power outage, two sisters learn to survive on their own in their isolated woodland home.

name: Highlander: Endgame
summary_text: Immortals Connor and Duncan MacLeod must join forces against Kell, an evil immortal who has become too strong for anyone to face alone.

name: Burke and Hare
summary_text: A black comedy about two nineteenth century grave robbers, who find a lucrative business providing cadavers for an Edinburgh medical school.

name: Austenland
summary_text: Obsessed with Pride and Prejudice (1995), a woman travels to a Jane Austen theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.

name: Courageous
summary_text: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers; together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.

name: The Adventures of Rocky & Bullwinkle
summary_text: When enemies Boris, Natasha, and Fearless Leader escape into the real world with a nefarious scheme, Rocky and Bullwinkle do the same, and team up with a young F.B.I. Agent to stop the trio.

name: The Sure Thing
summary_text: Walter Gibson is a university freshman going through a dry spell. His old buddy arranges a "sure thing" for him in California. Gibson and his classmate Allison then take a long road trip out to Cali, and both foil each other's plans.

name: Tommy
summary_text: A psychosomatically deaf, dumb and blind boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

name: The Boxer
summary_text: Young Danny Flynn is released from prison 14 years after "taking the rap" for the IRA and tries to rebuild his life in his old Belfast neighborhood.

name: Battle Royale II
summary_text: Three years after the failure of the last BR program, a second act is forged and a class of students are sent to an island with one objective: kill international terrorist Shuya Nanahara.

name: My Dog Skip
summary_text: A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.

name: Rangasthalam 1985
summary_text: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

name: Santa Sangre
summary_text: A former circus artist escapes from a mental hospital to rejoin his armless mother - the leader of a strange religious cult - and is forced to enact brutal murders in her name as he becomes "her arms".

name: Sommersby
summary_text: A farmer returns home from the Civil War, but his wife begins to suspect that the man is an impostor.

name: Eyyvah Eyvah
summary_text: A clarinet player goes on a search for his real father, teaming up with an eccentric nightclub singer.

name: Pusher II
summary_text: Tonny is released from prison - again. This time he has his mind set on changing his broken down life, but that is easier said than done.

name: The Week Of
summary_text: Two fathers with opposing personalities come together to celebrate the wedding of their children. They are forced to spend the longest week of their lives together, and the big day cannot come soon enough.

name: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning
summary_text: John looks to take down Luc Deveraux after a home invasion claims his wife and daughter. The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a UniSol in relentless pursuit.

name: It's All Gone Pete Tong
summary_text: A famous DJ in the Ibiza club scene finds the alcohol and drug-fueled party that is his life threatened by the progressive loss of his hearing.

name: Backcountry
summary_text: An urban couple go camping in the woods and find themselves lost in the territory of a predatory black bear.

name: Russian Ark
summary_text: A 19th century French aristocrat, notorious for his scathing memoirs about life in Russia, travels through the Russian State Hermitage Museum and encounters historical figures from the last 200+ years.

name: Piranha
summary_text: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

name: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul
summary_text: A lonely widow meets a much younger Arab worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.

name: The Gallows
summary_text: 20 years after a horrific accident during a small town school play, students at the school resurrect the failed show in a misguided attempt to honor the anniversary of the tragedy - but soon discover that some things are better left alone.

name: Recep Ivedik 2
summary_text: Recep gets a job and tries to find a wife to please his ailing grandmother.

name: Knights of Badassdom
summary_text: Live-action role players conjure up a demon from Hell by mistake and they must deal with the consequences.

name: Omkara
summary_text: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.

name: The Quiet Ones
summary_text: A university professor and a team of students conduct an experiment on a young woman, uncovering terrifyingly dark, unexpected forces in the process.

name: Drop Zone
summary_text: A tough cop teams up with a professional skydiver to capture a renegade computer hacker on the run from the law.

name: Monsieur Lazhar
summary_text: At a Montréal public grade school, an Algerian immigrant is hired to replace a popular teacher who committed suicide in her classroom. While helping his students deal with their grief, his own recent loss is revealed.

name: Veronica Guerin
summary_text: An Irish journalist writes a series of stories about drug dealers.

name: I Confess
summary_text: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

name: The Hurricane Heist
summary_text: Thieves attempt a massive heist against the U.S. Treasury as a Category 5 hurricane approaches one of its Mint facilities.

name: The Limehouse Golem
summary_text: In Victorian London, a Scotland Yard inspector hunts down the sadistic killer behind a series of gory, Jack the Ripper-Like murders.

name: The Numbers Station
summary_text: A disgraced black ops agent is dispatched to a remote CIA broadcast station to protect a code operator. Soon, they find themselves in a life-or-death struggle to stop a deadly plot before it's too late.

name: Wine Country
summary_text: During a vacation to Napa Valley, a group of long time friends reunite and revisit past choices in this hilarious and heartfelt comedy from director Amy Poehler.

name: Kaththi
summary_text: Jeevanandham is a social activist who fights against a monstrous MNC company to restore farming. Because of destiny, Kathiresan impersonates Jeevanandham and leads the war.

name: Song to Song
summary_text: Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.

name: The Crow: City of Angels
summary_text: The spirit of the Crow resurrects another man seeking revenge for the murder of his son.

name: The Yellow Sea
summary_text: When the attempt to kill a professor goes wrong, a series of violent events are triggered which force a taxi driver to run for his life.

name: Like Mike
summary_text: A 13-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.

name: The Parent Trap
summary_text: Teenage twin sisters swap places and scheme to reunite their divorced parents.

name: Quartet
summary_text: At a home for retired musicians, the annual concert to celebrate Composer Giuseppe Verdi's birthday is disrupted by the arrival of Jean (Dame Maggie Smith), an eternal diva and the former wife of one of the residents.

name: Quick Change
summary_text: Three thieves successfully rob a New York City bank, but making the escape from the city proves to be almost impossible.

name: Little Evil
summary_text: Gary, who has just married Samantha, the woman of his dreams, discovers that her six-year-old son may be the Antichrist.

name: Rise of the Footsoldier
summary_text: The life of career criminal Carlton Leach.

name: The Stoning of Soraya M.
summary_text: A desperate woman asks for a meeting with a journalist to disclose the cruel and inhumane punishment of her niece.

name: Mad City
summary_text: A distraught man inadvertently takes a group of children hostage in a museum while a hungry, seasoned reporter tries to resurrect his career covering the story.

name: Ninotchka
summary_text: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

name: Diana
summary_text: During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.

name: No One Lives
summary_text: A gang of ruthless highway killers kidnap a wealthy couple traveling cross country only to shockingly discover that things are not what they seem.

name: Cracks
summary_text: A look at the lives and relationships among girls at an elite boarding school.

name: The Beach Bum
summary_text: A rebellious stoner named Moondog lives life by his own rules.

name: Blank Check
summary_text: After a bike accident, a young boy inadvertently gains possession of a check for $1 million and proceeds to spend it, unaware that the gangsters to whom it belongs are in pursuit.

name: Ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever
summary_text: Tasked with destroying each other, an FBI agent and a rogue DIA agent soon discover that there's a much bigger enemy at work.

name: I
summary_text: A deformed hunchback kidnaps a bride on the day of her marriage and holds her hostage while his connection to her and his targets is revealed in a series of flashbacks that unfold as he starts seeking revenge.

name: The Starving Games
summary_text: In this Hunger Games spoof, Kantmiss Evershot must fight for her life in the 75th annual Starving Games, where she could also win an old ham, a coupon for a foot-long sub, and a partially eaten pickle.

name: Newsies
summary_text: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

name: Conspiracy
summary_text: At the Wannsee Conference on January 20, 1942, senior Nazi officials meet to determine the manner in which the so-called "Final Solution to the Jewish Question" can be best implemented.

name: O
summary_text: An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in an upper class prep school, & centered around basketball player Odin.

name: Bunraku
summary_text: The story of a a young man who has spent his life searching for revenge only to find himself up against a bigger challenge than he originally bargained for.

name: Swimfan
summary_text: A high school senior with a promising swimming career has a one-night stand with consequences.

name: No Good Deed
summary_text: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

name: Love & Basketball
summary_text: Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.

name: Kes
summary_text: A working-class English boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.

name: Holy Man
summary_text: Eddie Murphy stars as an over-the-top television evangelist who finds a way to turn television home shopping into a religious experience, and takes America by storm.

name: Blood Ties
summary_text: Two brothers, on either side of the law, face off over organized crime in Brooklyn during the 1970s.

name: Death in Venice
summary_text: While recovering in Venice, sickly Composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.

name: Wadjda
summary_text: An enterprising Saudi girl signs on for her school's Koran recitation competition as a way to raise the remaining funds she needs in order to buy the green bicycle that has captured her interest.

name: Center Stage
summary_text: A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.

name: Prince Avalanche
summary_text: Two highway road workers spend the summer of 1988 away from their city lives. The isolated landscape becomes a place of misadventure as the men find themselves at odds with each other and the women they left behind.

name: Relic
summary_text: A daughter, mother and grandmother are haunted by a manifestation of dementia that consumes their family's home.

name: 5 to 7
summary_text: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.

name: Leviathan
summary_text: Perched on the hull of a wrecked Soviet freighter, a team of deep-sea miners led by head oceanographer Steven Beck comes face to face with a mutant creature that's the product of a failed genetic experiment.

name: The Miseducation of Cameron Post
summary_text: In 1993, a teenage girl is forced into a gay conversion therapy center by her conservative guardians.

name: Waves
summary_text: Traces the journey of a suburban family - led by a well-intentioned but domineering father - as they navigate love, forgiveness, and coming together in the aftermath of a loss.

name: Black Friday
summary_text: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

name: Mon Oncle
summary_text: Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.

name: Inferno
summary_text: An American college student in Rome and his sister in New York investigate a series of killings in both locations where their resident addresses are the domain of two covens of witches.

name: 6 Days
summary_text: Based on the Iranian Embassy siege of 1980, this action-thriller dramatizes a six-day standoff between armed Iranian Arabs and SAS soldiers ready for a counterattack.

name: Texas Killing Fields
summary_text: In the Texas bayous, a local homicide detective teams up with a cop from New York City to investigate a series of unsolved murders.

name: Eat Drink Man Woman
summary_text: A senior chef lives with his three grown daughters; the middle one finds her future plans affected by unexpected events and the life changes of the other household members.

name: Zoom
summary_text: Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.

name: Henry's Crime
summary_text: Released from prison for a crime he didn't commit, an ex-con targets the same bank he was sent away for robbing.

name: Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
summary_text: A story of a fresh graduate trying to find a balance between the maddening demands of the 'professional' way, and the way of his heart.

name: The Apparition
summary_text: A couple is haunted by a supernatural presence that is unleashed during a college experiment.

name: My Blue Heaven
summary_text: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

name: Ben Is Back
summary_text: A drug addicted teenage boy shows up unexpectedly at his family's home on Christmas Eve.

name: Wanted
summary_text: Radhe is a ruthless gangster who will kill anyone for money. He is attracted towards Jhanvi, a middle class girl, who does not approve of his work and wants him to change.

name: Truth
summary_text: Newsroom drama detailing the 2004 CBS 60 Minutes report investigating then-President George W. Bush's military service, and the subsequent firestorm of criticism that cost anchor Dan Rather and producer Mary Mapes their careers.

name: Kikujiro
summary_text: A young, naive boy sets out alone on the road to find his wayward mother. Soon he finds an unlikely protector in a crotchety man and the two have a series of unexpected adventures along the way.

name: Supergirl
summary_text: After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

name: Picture Perfect
summary_text: A young advertising executive's life becomes increasingly complicated when, in order to impress her boss, she pretends to be engaged to a man she has just met.
